title: Getting Started with SiteSearch
content: Learn how to quickly integrate SiteSearch into your website. This guide covers the basic setup and configuration options to get you up and running in minutes.

title: Advanced Configuration Options
content: Explore the advanced configuration options available in SiteSearch. Customize the appearance, behavior, and search algorithms to match your specific requirements.

title: Integrating with APIs
content: Learn how to connect SiteSearch with various APIs to fetch dynamic content. This guide covers authentication, data formatting, and best practices for API integration.

title: Customizing the Search UI
content: Discover how to customize the SiteSearch user interface to match your website's design. This guide covers CSS variables, theme options, and advanced styling techniques.

title: Performance Optimization
content: Tips and tricks for optimizing SiteSearch performance on your website. Learn about caching strategies, lazy loading, and other techniques to ensure fast search results.

title: Implementing Search Analytics
content: Track and analyze search behavior on your website using SiteSearch analytics features. This guide covers setting up analytics, interpreting data, and improving search based on user behavior.

title: Multilingual Search Support
content: Configure SiteSearch to support multiple languages on your website. This guide covers language detection, character encoding, and localization strategies.

title: Troubleshooting Common Issues
content: Solutions for common problems encountered when using SiteSearch. This guide provides step-by-step troubleshooting procedures and workarounds for known issues.

title: SiteSearch API Reference
content: Complete reference documentation for the SiteSearch JavaScript API. This guide covers all methods, properties, and events available for developers.

title: Migrating from v0.9 to v1.0
content: Step-by-step guide for migrating from SiteSearch v0.9 to v1.0. This guide covers breaking changes, new features, and migration strategies.
